column1: # CRS is defined in `VoyagerToObservatory.xml` file with following axes:
# The CRS declared on the first header line should be "urn:ogc:def:crs:TB18-D025::HeliocentricCRS"
# but Apache SIS does not yet have a mechanism for referring to definitions using the identifiers
# found in the GML file. For now we cheat by specifying EPSG::4979.

column2: pitch and roll values given in this file (the last 3 columns) are random values.
